ygData.msgSnippet: I think it was High Elf, not half. Which I think be funny to see.  A high elf SK. lol. ... From: Grant Vanderhule  Reply-To:
ygData.messageBody:
I think it was High Elf, not half.

Which I think be funny to see. A high elf SK. lol.

i'd be all for a DE/HUM only 1h weapon, be it sword, scimitar, dagger, or
otherwise. everybody and his little brother has thulian claws by my level,
and i am always looking for ways to be different :) <- has 1hs, 2hs, and
piercing permanently maxed out, because i can.

also.. anybody else notice that the reaper of the dead, while SHD only, can
be used by dark elf, human, troll, ogre and HALF ELF? an oversight, or a
suggestion of something new in the works?

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
